short_summary: Supply, delivery and support documentation for qty 1 of a New rough terrain telehandler and qty 1 of a Used rough terrain telehandler.
description: The National Research Council of Canada has a requirement the Supply, delivery and support documentation for qty 1 of: a New rough terrain telehandler and qty 1 of: a Used rough terrain telehandler... See full description in the Tender Notice.
